Class GamePlayAPI

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class GamePlayAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the services for the Game Play. All the Phases relevant actions and events are listed down.

      • subArmies

        public boolean subArmies(Player player,
                         Country country,
                         int subAmount)
        This method will subtract army from player and country
        Parameters:
        player - player from whom we need to subtract army
        country - country from where we need to subtract army
        subAmount - amount of subtraction
        Returns:
        true if provided number of armies deleted else false

      • moveArmy

        public boolean moveArmy(Player player,
                        Country from,
                        Country to,
                        int noOfArmy)
        This method will move army for player from one country to another
        Parameters:
        player - player who wants to move army
        from - country from where players wants to move army
        to - country where player wants to move army
        noOfArmy - number of armies player wants to move
        Returns:
        true if armies moved else false if army not moved.
